Class CvtrData

java.lang.Object
CvtrData
public class CvtrData
extends java.lang.Object
The Convertator Data maintains information about the Data fields which are stored in Convertator format files. See the CvtrFile class for a description of the file format.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.lang.String elementCategory
    The name of the category of these elements.
    java.lang.String[] elementNames
    The list of element names.
    java.lang.String[] elementValues
    The list of element values.
    boolean isUnicode
    The flag indicating that characters are either UTF-8 (false) or UTF-16 (true).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description

    The Convertator Data constructor.
    CvtrData​(java.lang.String copyright, java.lang.String category, java.lang.String type, boolean unicode)
    The Convertator Data constructor validates the data type then sets it, the copyright, and the category name.

  • Constructor Details

    • CvtrData

      public CvtrData()
      The Convertator Data constructor.

    • CvtrData

      public CvtrData​(java.lang.String copyright, java.lang.String category, java.lang.String type, boolean unicode) throws java.lang.Exception
      The Convertator Data constructor validates the data type then sets it, the copyright, and the category name.
      Parameters:
      copyright - The copyright string of the Data, which must be no larger than 8192 characters.
      category - The category name of the data.
      type - The data type (U=Units, C=Constants, E=Equations).
      unicode - The format of data strings (true=Unicode, false=UTF-8)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the data type is invalid or the copyright length exceeds the maximum.
      java.lang.Exception

  • Method Details

    • validateData

      public java.lang.String validateData()
      Validate that all required fields are set.
      Returns:
      String The errors found or null if successful.

    • setDataType

      public void setDataType​(java.lang.String type)
      Set the requested data type flag to true and sets the others to false. If the input is not valid, all flags are set to false.
      Parameters:
      type - The data type (U=Units, C=Constants, E=Equations).

    • getDataType

      public java.lang.String getDataType()
      Get the data type where:
      • U = Units
      • C = Constants
      • E = Equations
      • blank = None
      Returns:
      String The data type (U=Units, C=Constants, E=Equations).

    • setCopyright

      public boolean setCopyright​(java.lang.String copyright)
      Set the Copyright text. The length of the text may be no greater than 8192 characters. The form of the notice should be:

        Copyright date name

        Location of full text of copyright

      The default copyright used for Convertator data is the Creative Commons license:

        Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0

      This license is explained at the Creative Commons site, and includes the full text. A copy of the full text is also delivered with the Convertator application.

      Parameters:
      copyright - The copyright string for the Data.
      Returns:
      boolean False if the copyright length exceeds the maximum, otherwise true.

    • getCopyright

      public java.lang.String getCopyright()
      Get the Copyright text.
      Returns:
      String The copyright text.
